verbose_text: Results : These nanocomposites could not only perform NIR light triggered photodynamic therapy (PDT) and photothermal therapy (PTT), but also achieve in vivo fluorescence (FL) / multispectral optical tomography (MSOT)/X-ray computed tomography (CT) triple-model bioimaging.
